job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkeling van web- en mobiele applicaties: Het ontwerp en de bouw van gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly refers to the design and construction of user-friendly applications, which falls under general software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Integratie van de dienst in gebruikersapplicaties
job_tasks.justification: This task involves incorporating a specific service into existing applications, a common software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdrage aan de middleware-layer: Bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de middleware-layer, waar de API-definitie wordt gerealiseerd en authenticatie plaatsvindt.
job_tasks.justification: This describes contributions to a middleware layer, including API definition and authentication, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: De LLM's moeten via virtualisatietechnieken gedeployed worden op de Nvidia-stack.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions LLMs (Large Language Models) and their deployment, which is a key aspect of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: De engineer werkt hier aan een schaalbaar, multi-tenant model.
job_tasks.justification: Working on a scalable, multi-tenant model relates to the operational aspects of deploying and managing AI models in a production environment.

soft_skills.phrase: Het ontwerp en de bouw van gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions LLMs and their deployment via virtualization techniques on the Nvidia stack. While there is significant software development involved (building applications and middleware), the core focus on LLMs points towards a GenAI Engineer role. The mention of scalability and multi-tenancy also aligns with productionizing generative AI.
